boat.construction_details: Epoxy-glued clinker marine plywood on laminated wood frames

for_sales.summary: Price reduced to £8,000, but even at the reduced price, people wanted to bargain, and in the end, the custodian decided give the boat to the AVEV.

boat.full_description:
Built by Claudio Frontero. an experienced, meticulous and methodical amateur boatbuilder who was taken ill not long after the boat was first launched in 2019.

In 2023 she was given to the Associazione Vele d'Epoca Verbano who hope to use her for vintage sailing lessons.
boat.home_port: Port of Cisano in Bardolino (on Lake Garda) VERONA
boat.name: Spirit of Wenda
boat.short_description: A beautiful auric yawl, built after drawing by Albert Strange
